objtitle.title: The Sea of Time and Space

objinfo.medium: water color and gouache on gesso ground
objinfo.pennednumbers: noneThe work is signed and dated "WBlake Inventor | 1821" bottom left.

provenance.name: National Trust, Arlington Court
provenance.note: Acquired at an unknown time by John Palmer Chichester of Arlington Court; by descent through Chichester's family to his great-granddaughter, Rosalie Chichester; given by her in 1947 to the National Trust as part of the contents of Arlington Court, Devon.

desc.objtitle:
The Sea of Time and Space,
Object 1 (Butlin 803)

objnote.p: This work, unrecorded until "discovered on top of a cupboard when Arlington Court was handed over to the National Trust in 1947" (Butlin 803), has been given several alternative titles by modern scholars, including *The Arlington Court Picture* and *Vision of the Circle of the Life of Man*.
